Detailed Description

This is the base class for all constraints supported.

This class provides the basis for all the other constraints. This is also a virtual class and provides no constraint properties of it's own, thus shouldn't/can't be called on manually.

phys::TypedConstraint::TypedConstraint ( ActorRigid *  bodya,
ActorRigid *  bodyb 
)

Two body constructor.

This constructor is used when the applicable constraint is applied to two bodies, as opposed to a point a world space.

Parameters:
bodya First actor to be applied to.
bodyb Second actor to be applied to.

virtual Real phys::TypedConstraint::GetParam ( int  num,
int  axis = -1 
) [pure virtual]

Gets value of constraint parameters.

See SetParam() for clarification. Gets information on constraint parameters.

Parameters:
num The parameter to get information for.
axis Optional axis.
Returns:
Returns the value for the requested parameter.

Implemented in phys::ConeTwistConstraint, phys::Generic6DofConstraint, phys::HingeConstraint, phys::Point2PointConstraint, and phys::SliderConstraint.

virtual void phys::TypedConstraint::SetParam ( int  num,
Real  value,
int  axis = -1 
) [pure virtual]

Provides override of constraint parameters.

Parameters such as ERP and CFM can be altered with this function. Optionally provide axis.

Parameters:
num The parameter to override.
value The new value for the parameter.
axis Optional axis.

Implemented in phys::ConeTwistConstraint, phys::Generic6DofConstraint, phys::HingeConstraint, phys::Point2PointConstraint, and phys::SliderConstraint.
